title: Honey Throat
description:
The blockbuster of them all! Starring the greatest luminaries in the glittering array of sex stars: John Holmes, Serena, Samantha Foxx (Best Erotic Actress Award) and Eric Edwards, "Honey Throat" finally delivers what so many others have just promised. 

In scene after excruciating erotic scene, these talented performers use their eroticism to stimulate each other to the heights of exquisite pleasure, and to bring the audience to undreamed-of visual and emotional satisfaction.
